statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT biometric_identifier, payment_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE biometric_identifier = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE biometric_identifier = 'JohnDoe123' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT biometric_identifier, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY biometric_identifier HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_details WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_details WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT transaction_history.transaction_id, transaction_history.transaction_date, payment_details.amount_paid FROM transaction_history INNER JOIN payment_details ON transaction_history.transaction_id = payment_details.transaction_id;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BiometricIdentifiers WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionHistory WHERE biometric_identifier IS NOT NULL ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT bi.biometric_type, bi.biometric_data, th.transaction_date FROM BiometricIdentifiers bi INNER JOIN TransactionHistory th ON bi.biometric_identifier = th.biometric_identifier;

SELECT pd.payment_id, pd.payment_date, pd.payment_amount, th.transaction_date FROM PaymentDetails pd JOIN TransactionHistory th ON pd.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE pd.payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY pd.payment_date ASC;
SELECT th.transaction_id, bi.biometric_type FROM TransactionHistory th JOIN BiometricIdentifiers bi ON th.biometric_identifier = bi.biometric_identifier WHERE th.transaction_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT biometric_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_details WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_details ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_amount, pd.payment_method FROM transaction_history th JOIN payment_details pd ON th.transaction_id = pd.transaction_id WHERE pd.payment_amount > 100;
SELECT bp.full_name, bp.email, bi.bio_id FROM user_profiles bp JOIN biometric_identifiers bi ON bp.user_id = bi.user_id;
SELECT user_id, full_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY full_name;

SELECT th.transaction_amount, pd.payment_method, bp.phone_number FROM transaction_history th JOIN payment_details pd ON th.transaction_id = pd.transaction_id JOIN user_profiles bp ON bp.user_id = pd.user_id WHERE th.transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history JOIN user_transactions USING (transaction_id);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, t.transaction_date, p.amount_paid FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_transactions ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN payment_details p ON ut.payment_id = p.payment_id JOIN transaction_history t ON ut.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;

SELECT bi.user_id, bi.fingerprint_data, bi.iris_scan_data, t.transaction_amount FROM biometric_identifiers bi JOIN user_transactions ut ON bi.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN transaction_history t ON ut.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount < 5000 ORDER BY bi.user_id ASC, t.transaction_amount DESC;
